title: Support Main LF Carry Mid/ADC (High Silver\Gold ) / Casual Ranked Team
body:
I play ranked a few times a day, Need to get to gold by end of the season, not an option. 

Looking for someone who understands how to play with the team, Doesnt give up and say GG after 3mins in, Can predict and have knowledge of the game. (too many times ive played and people do anything for kills with out focusing on objectives) 

I currently main {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} , Can play {{champion:1}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:89}} 

Also am looking for a casual ranked team.

replies.body: How high silver do i have to be? ;-;

III or Higher
uh sure, just add me i don't main ad but i play it decent enough
send me a invite sometime i can play any role
